title: My island home
creator_credit: Roger Blais, Tim Wilson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Prince Edward Island—a place of pleasant beaches, warm seas and endless sand. At the same time there is a surprising amount of activity in this “Garden of the Gulf.” You explore it with an Islander who knows its every delight.
